title: Men's Elite Run Jogger - Black

You'll enjoy all-day comfort in the new Zoot Joggers. From working out to hanging out, the premium blend of ultra-soft fabric provides ultimate relaxed comfort. An elastic waistband with drawcord allows for an adjustable fit. The classic tapered silhouette keeps up with your every move. Our new joggers are designed to perform and good-looking enough to be your go-to for everything else.

FEATURES

FIT

Zoot products are designed to be RACE FIT to maximize performance and aerodynamic benefits. For a less compressive feel we recommend you size up. If you are between sizes, we recommend you size up.

Model is 6'0" (183 cm) and 165 lbs (75kg). He is wearing size MEDIUM.

FABRIC

SHIPPING

Orders ship within 1-2 business days.  All orders ship USPS or FED EX from our Zoot HQ in Southern California.

30-DAY RETURNS

ZOOT OHANA GUARANTEE

If you are not satisfied with the look, fit or feel of your Zoot product, return it within 30 days for a full refund.

We will even pay for the return shipping!

* Sale section items are eligible for return. Customer is responsible for return shipping on items purchased in the sale section of website.

*All Customized gear and Face Covering products are not eligible for return or exchange.

I prefer to be warm on cool morning runs. These joggers are the perfect weight and thickness. They are comfortable and can be worn around the house or running errands. I am pleased with the product.

I love, love these! I wish there were other colors, like charcoal gray.

These are so comfortable and great for those chilly morning runs.

Very comfortable & fit well

Comfortable and fit well.

json_ld.name: Men's Elite Run Jogger - Black
json_ld.description:
You'll enjoy all-day comfort in the new Zoot Joggers. From working out to hanging out, the premium blend of ultra-soft fabric provides ultimate relaxed comfort. An elastic waistband with drawcord allows for an adjustable fit. The classic tapered silhouette keeps up with your every move. Our new joggers are designed to perform and good-looking enough to be your go-to for everything else.

FEATURES
  • Premium blend of ultra-soft fabric for ultimate comfort
  • Relax fit for working out or just hanging out
  • Zipper back pocket for secure storage
  • Elastic waistband with drawcord for an adjustable fit
  • UPF 50+ sun protection
FIT

Zoot products are designed to be RACE FIT to maximize performance and aerodynamic benefits. For a less compressive feel we recommend you size up. If you are between sizes, we recommend you size up.


Model is 6'0" (183 cm) and 165 lbs (75kg). He is wearing size MEDIUM.

FABRIC 
  • Body: 67% Nylon, 22% Polyester, 11% Elastane 240 gm2
